languages.text: Whenever the wearer of these gloves gets an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} or falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} in combat, their allies gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда носитель этих перчаток получает {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранение{/g} или падает {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}без сознания{/g} в бою, его союзники получают +1 к наносимому {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer of these gloves gets an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} or falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} in combat, their allies gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to damage.

Whenever the wearer of these gloves gets an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} or falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} in combat, their allies gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

languages.text: Когда носитель этих перчаток получает {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранение{/g} или падает {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}без сознания{/g} в бою, его союзники получают +1 к наносимому {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g}.

Immer wenn der Träger dieser Handschuhe eine {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzung{/g} erhält oder im Kampf {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}bewusstlos{/g} wird, erhalten seine Verbündeten einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +1 auf {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer of these gloves gets an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} or falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} in combat, their allies gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Träger dieser Handschuhe eine {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzung{/g} erhält oder im Kampf {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}bewusstlos{/g} wird, erhalten seine Verbündeten einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +1 auf Schaden.

languages.text: Lorsque l'utilisateur de ces gants subit une {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésion{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}perd connaissance{/g} au combat, ses alliés reçoivent un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +1 point de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer of these gloves gets an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} or falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} in combat, their allies gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque l'utilisateur de ces gants subit une {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésion{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}perd connaissance{/g} au combat, ses alliés reçoivent un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +1 point de dégâts.

languages.text: 每当装备者在战斗中承受{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}或陷入{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}昏迷{/g}时，所有盟友造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}都会提高1点。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer of these gloves gets an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} or falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} in combat, their allies gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者在战斗中承受{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}或陷入{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}昏迷{/g}时，所有盟友造成的伤害都会提高1点。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador de estos guantes reciba una {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesión{/g} o caiga {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}inconsciente{/g} en combate, sus aliados ganan +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer of these gloves gets an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} or falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} in combat, their allies gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador de estos guantes reciba una {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesión{/g} o caiga {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}inconsciente{/g} en combate, sus aliados ganan +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de daño.

languages.text: この手袋の使用者は戦闘で{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}負傷{/g}を1受けるか、{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}意識不明{/g}状態に陥り、味方は{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}に対して{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を1獲得する。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer of these gloves gets an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} or falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} in combat, their allies gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この手袋の使用者は戦闘で{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}負傷{/g}を1受けるか、{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}意識不明{/g}状態に陥り、味方はダメージに対して{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を1獲得する。
